title: Why Cycles Big Iron V2 fat bike loads updated geometry plus SRAM UDH
content:
It may be named after the famous Marty Robbins song, but the Why Cycles Big Iron isn’t actually iron. Instead, it’s a titanium fat bike designed to be the ideal tool to venture out for all kinds of fat bike adventures. And now, the Big Iron has been updated with a few frame tweaks to

The post Why Cycles Big Iron V2 fat bike loads updated geometry plus SRAM UDH appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
